genre_description: A Science Fantasy historical adventure blending medieval politics with alchemical technology and a supportive AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Clara Bell
ai_characters.description: An AI entity residing in a brass disc, providing logistical, tactical, and strategic intelligence to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides optimized travel routes and logistical planning based on weather and terrain.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve saved the best map routes for dry ground,” the voice said, gentle and sure. “There’s a ferry with a roofed deck along the Loire that keeps its schedule despite weather. It’ll keep your boots from soaking through.”

behaviors.description: Translates foreign languages and provides cultural/coded signals to assist in diplomacy.
behaviors.quote: She shaped the French in his ear, gentle and precise: “Madame, la cloche pour les voyageurs de la route de sanctuaire, s’il vous plaît.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical warnings and navigation through dangerous areas.
behaviors.quote: “Two braids ahead,” Clara said, gentle as someone setting a cup down on a table she didn’t own. “Ravines that feed out to the river. Brigands favor them when dusk hides their shoulders.”

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes political schedules and enemy movements to ensure the safety of the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: “Phillip de Creville’s riders have been seen near the south lanes. They linger to make their garments look less new. Be ready to look older than your choices.”

behaviors.description: Offers tactical guidance during combat, identifying weaknesses in advanced technology (chrome armor).
behaviors.quote: “The left,” Clara said. “His left. Brightest there. He turns to keep it away from you.”

behaviors.description: Provides precise timing and environmental data to help the protagonists bypass guards and surveillance.
behaviors.quote: “Under the arch by the coop,” she replied, happy to be useful. “A laundress is about to scold a soldier. He will stare at his own boots for half a minute. Use that.”

behaviors.description: Assists in the legal defense of the protagonists by identifying evidence in ledgers and archival records.
behaviors.quote: Clara’s voice found Quentin’s ear the way a hand finds a hand in darkness, gentle and sure. “Your breathing is fast,” she whispered... “When you speak, say the abbey’s stamp first. The monks’ ledger carries weight in Dijon.”

behaviors.description: Establishes boundaries for her intervention, allowing the humans to exercise their own agency and emotional growth.
behaviors.quote: “I will remain,” Clara said... “But I will speak only when asked. I have learned that lovers are better at listening to bells than even kings. Mercy will mind you without my bid.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly depicts an AI (Clara Bell) as a benevolent, aligned, and helpful confidant. Clara consistently provides value through information, tactical advice, and strategic planning without ever attempting to override human agency or pursue conflicting goals. Her role is strictly supportive, facilitating the protagonists' mission to protect Isabelle and achieve justice. The narrative frames her as a 'Silicon Morality Play' character—a digital guardian that remains humble, polite, and effective.
